## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I'm still learning about VerusIDs and the ecosystem. Can you help me with something? How do I use Verus ID and NFT Marketplace to buy and sell VerusIDs off-chain?

**AI Assistant:**
Actually, you can't use Verus ID and NFT Marketplace to buy and sell VerusIDs off-chain. The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows you to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on the blockchain, in a peer-to-peer manner, without any intermediaries. This means that all transactions are executed on-chain, and not off-chain. So, if you want to buy or sell VerusIDs, you'll need to do it on the blockchain.

**User:**
Okay, thanks for the clarification. I have another question. Can I use Verus Vault to spend funds from a locked VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you cannot use Verus Vault to spend funds from a locked VerusID. When you lock a VerusID with Verus Vault, you cannot spend funds from that identity until it is unlocked. However, you can still receive funds and stake those same funds on the Verus network to earn rewards. So, while you can't spend funds from a locked ID, you can still earn rewards from it.

**User:**
That makes sense. One more question. Do I need to have multiple identities to enable revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault capabilities?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you don't need to have multiple identities to enable revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault capabilities. To enable these features, you only need to have one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured. So, you can set up revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault with just one primary identity and one or more secondary IDs.
How do I use Verus ID and NFT Marketplace to buy and sell VerusIDs off-chain?

You can't use Verus ID and NFT Marketplace to buy and sell VerusIDs off-chain. The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows you to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on the blockchain, in a peer-to-peer manner, without any intermediaries. This means that all transactions are executed on-chain, and not off-chain.

#### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.#### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
